marklogic.body:
Boring. Â Why don't you go back to your Tourette's schtick?
I guess this is what you're stuck with when you've obviously been embarrassed with your racist stance on this issue.
Remember when you laughed at the Trayvon Martin death jokes? Â Funny stuff.
You might look at the scoreboard. Â You lost, racist.
Maybe Jeffrey can come up with some more Trayvon death jokes you can laugh at. The one about the Heat and the flies that you said you spit drink out your nose about?
You're a class Act. Â You should hope there is no such thing as karma.
Now go on some diatribe that avoids these facts. Â It's all you got.
